# Rigour Labs

Rigour Labs is an R&D laboratory building the infrastructure for verifiable software and high-integrity systems. We engineer tools that protect the trust and transparency of human-AI collaboration.

## Our Ecosystem

### Rigovo (SaaS)
Rigovo (formerly TalentLyt) is a comprehensive AI-driven hiring integrity platform. It eliminates interview fraud and ensures a verifiable hiring process through live monitoring and AI anomaly detection.
URL: https://rigovo.com

### Rigour CLI (OSS)
Rigour CLI is an open-source framework for building verifiable codebases. It ensures that AI-generated code meets production standards through zero-telemetry gates and deep static analysis.
URL: https://rigour.run

## Our Mission
We stand for technical rigour in an era of "vibe coding". Our mission is to bridge the gap between innovation and accountability through verifiable systems, human-AI integrity, and zero-telemetry privacy.

## Contact & Resources
GitHub: https://github.com/rigour-labs
Website: https://rigour-labs.dev
Address: India (Engineering Hub)
